H0.text: In which year did Captain Scott reach the South Pole. 1909

H1.text: In which year did Captain Scott reach the South Pole. 1910

H2.text: In which year did Captain Scott reach the South Pole. 1911

H3.text: In which year did Captain Scott reach the South Pole. 1912

A4.text: On the second venture, Scott led a party of five which reached the South Pole on 17 January 1912.

A5.text: The expedition reached the South Pole on 17 January 1912, less than five weeks after Amundsen's South Pole expedition.
